Research in real-time dependable systems and risk assessment My goal is to advance techniques, tools, and computing platforms that enable the development of provably safe systems in a time- and cost-efficient way, with applications in: Automotive and aerospace embedded systems: automated synthesis of E/E architecture (design-space exploration, machine learning) & timing and dependability verification Risk assessment: quantify risks using probabilistic models derived from historical data Here is a list of my publications (available for download) and slides from recent talks.
